ThingDef.label: Space paste
ThingDef.description: Hermetically sealed paste for nutrition in space.

ThingDef.label: boiled meat
ThingDef.description: Heat-treated meat. Sufficiently bland, but edible

ThingDef.label: boiled fish
ThingDef.description: Heat-treated fish. Sufficiently bland, but edible.

ThingDef.label: White bread
ThingDef.description: Baked white bread made from wheat flour.

ThingDef.label: Black bread
ThingDef.description: Baked black bread made from rye flour.

ThingDef.label: Jelly butter
ThingDef.description: Fresh sandwich made from bread and insect jelly. Rich in vitamins and carbohydrates.

ThingDef.label: roasted eggs
ThingDef.description: Fried eggs. Rich in almost all useful substances.

ThingDef.label: boiled eggs
ThingDef.description: Hard-boiled eggs. Rich in almost all useful substances.

ThingDef.label: Cheese
ThingDef.description: Product of a long and complex bacterial process derived from animal milk.

ThingDef.label: Cheese mass
ThingDef.description: Fermented milk and salt. Can be turned into cheese.

ThingDef.label: Sand cactus
ThingDef.description: A creaky cactus fruit preserved with sand. Abomination.
